Akan Keliling Destinasi Super Prioritas, Ini Rencana Wishnutama
07 Nov 2019, 23:39 by Rolando Fransiscus Sihombing


Ilustrasi Mandalika Lombok (Foto: AFP)

Jakarta - Menparekraf Wishnutama Kusubandio akan berkeliling ke lima destinasi super prioritas yang pembangunannya sedang dikebut pemerintah. Ia berencana mengumpulkan informasi langsung dari kelima destinasi tersebut.Menjawab pertanyaan wartawan di Gedung DPR, Jakarta, Kamis (7/11/2019), Wishnutama mengaku sudah memiliki gambaran yang dibutuhkan lima destinasi super prioritas, terkait dengan ucapan Presiden Joko Widodo yang mengatakan pertumbuhan ekonomi berkaitan erat dengan sektor pariwisata."Sudah, sudah (ada gambaran). Jadi sebelum saya ditunjuk jadi menteri, Kementerian PUPR dan Kemenhub sudah mendesain berbagai konsep. Sekarang dalam proses untuk diwujudkan dan diharapkan 2020 semua itu kelar," jelas Wishnutama.Selain infrastruktur, ia juga menekankan pentingnya beragam hal lain demi menyokong tempat wisata tersebut. Di antaranya kesiapan masyarakat setempat dalam mengemas dan menyambut sebaik mungkin wisatawan yang datang."Nah menjelang itu kelar kita harus memikirkan berbagai macam. Katakanlah kemasan, daya, kemampuan masyarakat setempat untuk dapat membuat destinasi wisata itu jauh lebih menarik, bukan hanya infrastruktur," urai dia."Kan wisata itu kan bukan infrastruktur saja. Selain kultur, kebersihan, ramah lingkungan. Sekarang kan eranya gitu," imbuh Wishnutama.Mendapati pertanyaan mengenai destinasi super prioritas mana yang masih lebih butuh dorongan, Menparekraf kembali menyatakan niatnya untuk melakukan tinjauan langsung. Ia berencana menyerap segala sesuatu yang ada di kelimat tempat wisata itu, termasuk apa yang masih menjadi kendala di sana."Dalam waktu dekat saya akan keliling. Saya harus lihat sendiri. Saya nggak mau denger laporan. Artinya dalam hal ini saya harus pelajari sampai di mana, apa kendalanya," tegas dia."Jadi saya harus melihat sendiri, turun langsung. Saya baru bisa komentar," imbuh dia mengakhiri.Untuk diketahui, lima destinasi super prioritas di atas yakni Labuan Bajo, Danau Toba, Mandalika, Borobudur, dan Likupang. Pembangunan fasilitas penunjang pariwisata di sana kini sedang dikebut dan untuk infrastrukturnya ditarget selesai pada tahun 2020.Simak Video "Siap Jadi Menteri, Wishnutama Bahas Kreativitas Bareng Jokowi"[Gambas:Video 20detik](msl/msl)

Going Around the Super Priority Destination, This is the Wishnutama Plan
Nov 7 2019, 23:39 by Rolando Fransiscus Sihombing


Illustration of Mandalika Lombok (Photo: AFP)

Jakarta - Menparekraf Wishnutama Kusubandio will tour five super priority destinations whose development is being accelerated by the government. He plans to collect information directly from the five destinations. Answering reporters' questions at the Parliament Building, Jakarta, Thursday (11/07/2019), Wishnutama admitted that he already had the picture needed by five super priority destinations, related to what President Joko Widodo said that economic growth closely related to the tourism sector. "Yes, I have (there is a picture). So before I was appointed minister, the Ministry of PUPR and the Ministry of Transportation had designed various concepts. Now in the process of being realized and expected by 2020 it will all be finished," Wishnutama explained. he also stressed the importance of various other things in order to support these tourist attractions. Among these are the readiness of the local community to package and welcome the best tourists who come. "Well ahead of that time we will have to think of various kinds. Say the packaging, power, the ability of the local community to be able to make the tourist destination far more attractive, not just infrastructure," explained "Tourism is not just infrastructure. Besides culture, cleanliness, environmentally friendly. Now the era is like that," added Wishnutama. Finding questions about which super priority destinations still need more encouragement, the Menparekraf stated his intention to conduct a direct review. He plans to absorb everything in the place of the tourist attractions, including what is still an obstacle there. "In the near future I will go around. I have to see for myself. I do not want to hear the report. Meaning that in this case I must learn to arrive at "So, I have to see for myself, come down immediately. I can only comment," he concluded ending. For your information, the five priority destinations above are Labuan Bajo, Lake Toba, Mandalika, Borobudur, and Likupang. The construction of tourism support facilities there is now being accelerated and the infrastructure is targeted to be completed by 2020.
